32.heading: Yronwode, Catherine, 1947-
32.title: Comics Buyer's Guide Video [videorecording] : news stories, film and home video from the collection of Alan L. Light.
32.author: [No author]
notes: 1 videocassette : col.
Beta and VHS.

The history, format and purpose of the "Buyer's Guide for Comic Fandom" are discussed by Alan Light, Rick Best, Lavon Light, and Don and Maggie Thompson. Also included are scenes showing the production of the Buyer's Guide, a tour of a comics printing plant at Sparta, Ill., and interviews with Max Collins and Cat Yronwode. 1. Buyer's Guide for Comic Fandom. 2. Comic books, strips, etc.

Publication and distribution. I. Light, Alan L. II. Best, Rick. III. Light, Lavon. IV.Thompson, Don. V. Thompson, Maggie. VI. Collins, Max Allan. VII. Yronwode, Catherine, 1947- Call no.: PN6725.L53 1985

139.heading: Yucatan.
139.title: The Falcon and the Flame
139.author: written and illustrated by Walter S
notes: 1 v. : ill. ; 26 cm.
(Sheba ; v. 2)
Most of this material was previously printed in Sheba, v. 2, issues 5-8.

"From the wilds of Persia to the pyramids of the Yucatan, Sheba's racking up the frequent flyer miles as Seth closes in on his target, a large striped box. But does the secret to thwarting this self-described 'ultimate evil' lie in the past, in the court of Egypt's final queen?"
